name: @acfatah/memory-cache
description: A simple in-memory cache for bun and nodejs.

scripts.lint:changed: { git diff --name-only -z --diff-filter=d --relative HEAD; git ls-files -z --others --exclude-standard -- ':./'; } | xargs -0 -r bunx --bun eslint --pass-on-no-patterns --no-warn-ignored
scripts.format:changed: { git diff --name-only -z --diff-filter=d --relative HEAD; git ls-files -z --others --exclude-standard -- ':./'; } | xargs -0 -r bunx --bun eslint --fix --no-warn-ignored
scripts.format:staged: staged_files=$(git diff --relative --cached --name-only --diff-filter=d); bunx --bun eslint --fix --pass-on-no-patterns --no-warn-ignored $staged_files && git add $staged_files
scripts.test:e2e: bun run build && bunx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:headed: bun run build && bunx playwright test --headed
scripts.test:e2e:debug: bun run build && bunx playwright test --debug
scripts.precommit: bun run typecheck && bun run lint:staged
